Paragraph: A patient with chronic renal failure ( CRF ) developed neuroleptic malignant syndrome ( NMS ) after administration of risperidone and levomepromazine .

| --- |
| risperidone |
| levomepromazine |

In this paragraph, the two mentioned chemicals are the neuroleptic drugs risperidone and levomepromazine, which were administered to the patient and led to the development of neuroleptic malignant syndrome (NMS).
